translated: Forming this, one should repeat ‚Äúa‚Äù and meditate on oneself as Vairochana until one sees oneself in the form of that [Vairochana].

original: de nas grub pas rnam par snang mdzad dang 'dra bar 'gyur ro //
analyzed: de nas grub pas rnam par snang mdzad dang 'dra bar 'gyur ro //
translated: Then, through accomplishment, one becomes like Vairocana.

original: phyag rgya thams cad kyi khu tshur gyi dam tshig ces bya ba la /
analyzed: phyag rgya thams cad kyi khu tshur gyi dam tshig ces bya ba la /
translated: The pledge of the fist of all seals is as follows.

original: de bzhin nyid ni phyag rgya thams cad kyi khu tshur ro //
analyzed: de bzhin nyid ni phyag rgya thams cad kyi khu tshur ro //
translated: Suchness is the fist of all seals.

original: de'i dam tshig ni de las byung ba'i rdo rje khu tshur gyi dkyil 'khor te /
analyzed: de'i dam tshig ni de las byung ba'i rdo rje khu tshur gyi dkyil 'khor te /
translated: The pledge is the mandala of the vajra fist that arises from that.

original: ming de skad ces bya ba'i rtog pa'i rgyal po rdzogs pa ste /
analyzed: ming de skad ces bya ba'i rtog pa'i rgyal po rdzogs pa ste /
translated: This is the complete king of tantras called the Vajra Fist.

original: de ltar bcom ldan 'das rdo rje khu tshur gyi rtog pa'i rgyal po'i bshad pa rdzogs so /üîΩ// / da ni @189a * //
analyzed: de ltar bcom ldan 'das rdo rje khu tshur gyi rtog pa'i rgyal po'i bshad pa rdzogs so / // / da ni @189a * //
translated: Thus concludes the explanation of the king of tantras called the Vajra Fist.

original: shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgoms pas gsang sngags rnam par 'grub par 'gyur ro zhes bya ba 'di'i don bstan par bya ba'i phyir /
analyzed: shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgoms pas gsang sngags rnam par 'grub par 'gyur ro zhes bya ba 'di'i don bstan par bya ba'i phyir /
translated: Now, in order to teach the meaning of the statement ‚ÄúBy cultivating the perfection of wisdom, the secret mantras are accomplished,‚Äù

original: shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa gtso bor gyur pa 'khor lo ltar yi ge bskor ba'i rtog pa'i rgyal po'i bshad pa ni /
analyzed: shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa gtso bor gyur pa 'khor lo ltar yi ge bskor ba'i rtog pa'i rgyal po'i bshad pa ni /
translated: the explanation of the king of tantras called the Wheel of Letters, which is primarily the perfection of wisdom, is as follows.

original: de nas zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs pa yin te /
analyzed: de nas zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs pa yin te /
translated: Then, etc.

original: de nas zhes bya ba'i sgra ni de ma thag pa ste /
analyzed: de nas zhes bya ba'i sgra ni de ma thag pa ste /
translated: The word then is immediately after.

original: sngar bshad pa'i 'dod pa'i khams thams cad kyi gzhan 'phrul dbang byed kyi lha'i gnas su bcom ldan 'das rnam par snang mdzad bzhugs pa dang / de'i rjes thogs nyid la 'khor lo ltar yi ge bskor ba zhes bya ba shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i tshul 'di gsungs so //
analyzed: sngar bshad pa'i 'dod pa'i khams thams cad kyi gzhan 'phrul dbang byed kyi lha'i gnas su bcom ldan 'das rnam par snang mdzad bzhugs pa dang / de'i rjes thogs nyid la 'khor lo ltar yi ge bskor ba zhes bya ba shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i tshul 'di gsungs so //
translated: The Bhagavat Vairocana, who resides in the abode of the Paranirmitavasavartin gods of the desire realm explained above, immediately after that, taught this method of the perfection of wisdom called the wheel of letters.

original: chos thams cad spros pa med pa'i de bzhin gshegs pas zhes bya ba la /
analyzed: chos thams cad spros pa med pa'i de bzhin gshegs pas zhes bya ba la /
translated: The Tathagata, who is free from the elaborations of all phenomena, etc.

original: chos thams cad ni byang chub kyi sems chen po dang / sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / kun gzhi'i rnam par shes pa dang /
analyzed: chos thams cad ni byang chub kyi sems chen po dang / sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / kun gzhi'i rnam par shes pa dang /
translated: All phenomena are the great mind of enlightenment, the perfection of generosity, the perfection of wisdom, the perfection of effort, the foundation consciousness,

original: nyon mongs pa can gyi yid dang / so sor rtog par byed pa'i yid kyi rnam par shes pa dang / gang rnam par mi rtog pa'i yid kyi rnam par shes pa dang / mig dang / rna ba dang / sna dang / lce dang /
analyzed: nyon mongs pa can gyi yid dang / so sor rtog par byed pa'i yid kyi rnam par shes pa dang / gang rnam par mi rtog pa'i yid kyi rnam par shes pa dang / mig dang / rna ba dang / sna dang / lce dang /
translated: the afflicted mind, the mental consciousness that discerns individually, the nonconceptual mental consciousness, and the consciousnesses of the eyes, ears, nose, tongue,

original: lus kyi rnam par shes pa 'di dag gi yul rnams dang / me long lta bu'i ye shes dang / mnyam pa nyid dang / so sor rtog pa dang / bya ba grub pa'i ye shes dang / ngo bo nyid kyis ku dang / rnam par mi rtog pa'i sku dang /
analyzed: lus kyi rnam par shes pa 'di dag gi yul rnams dang / me long lta bu'i ye shes dang / mnyam pa nyid dang / so sor rtog pa dang / bya ba grub pa'i ye shes dang / ngo bo nyid kyis ku dang / rnam par mi rtog pa'i sku dang /
translated: and body, as well as their objects, the mirror-like wisdom, the wisdom of equality, the wisdom of individual discernment, the wisdom of accomplishing activities, the wisdom of the essential nature, the nonconceptual body,

original: longs spyod rdzogs pa'i sku dang / sprul pa'i sku dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i rigs dang / rdo rje dang / padma dang / rin po che dang / las kyi rigs rnams dang / de rnams la spros pa ni rnam par rtog pa rnams so //
analyzed: longs spyod rdzogs pa'i sku dang / sprul pa'i sku dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i rigs dang / rdo rje dang / padma dang / rin po che dang / las kyi rigs rnams dang / de rnams la spros pa ni rnam par rtog pa rnams so //
translated: the body of perfect enjoyment, the emanation body, the tathƒÅgata family, the vajra, lotus, jewel, and action families, and the conceptual thoughts that proliferate about them.

original: ma spros pa ni spros pa med pa ste /
analyzed: ma spros pa ni spros pa med pa ste /
translated: Nonproliferation is the absence of proliferation.

original: byang chub kyi sems la sogs par rnam par rtog pa med pa'o //
analyzed: byang chub kyi sems la sogs par rnam par rtog pa med pa'o //
translated: It is the absence of conceptualization in regard to the thought of enlightenment, etc.

original: de gang la yod pa de ni chos thams cad spros pa med pa ste /
analyzed: de gang la yod pa de ni chos thams cad spros pa med pa ste /
translated: That is the absence of conceptual elaboration of all things,

original: gzung ba dang 'dzin pa'i rnam par rtog pa dang bral zhing gnyis su med pa'i chos kyi dbyings shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i ngo bo nyid do //
analyzed: gzung ba dang 'dzin pa'i rnam par rtog pa dang bral zhing gnyis su med pa'i chos kyi dbyings shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i ngo bo nyid do //
translated: free from the conceptualization of the apprehended object and apprehending subject, the reality realm which is nondual, the essence of the perfection of wisdom.

original: de bzhin gshegs pa zhes bya ba ni bshad zin to //
analyzed: de bzhin gshegs pa zhes bya ba ni bshad zin to //
translated: The TathƒÅgata has already been explained.

original: 'khor lo ltar yi ge bskor ba zhes bya ba ni aa ra pa tsa la sogs pa'i yi ge rnams 'khor lo ltar yongs su bskor @189b zhing /
analyzed: 'khor lo ltar yi ge bskor ba zhes bya ba ni aa ra pa tsa la sogs pa'i yi ge rnams 'khor lo ltar yongs su bskor @189b zhing /
translated: The wheel-like arrangement of the syllables is the wheel-like arrangement of the syllables such as a ra pa ca, etc.

original: mngon sum du gyur pa gang la thos pa dang / bsam pa dang / bsgom pa'i rang bzhin gyis shes pas mngon sum du byas pa'i shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i tshul gang yin pa de ni 'khor lo ltar yi ge bskor bzhes bya ste /
analyzed: mngon sum du gyur pa gang la thos pa dang / bsam pa dang / bsgom pa'i rang bzhin gyis shes pas mngon sum du byas pa'i shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i tshul gang yin pa de ni 'khor lo ltar yi ge bskor bzhes bya ste /
translated: The method of the perfection of wisdom which is made manifest by the knowledge that is made manifest by the knowledge which is of the nature of hearing, reflection, and meditation, that is called the wheel-like arrangement of the syllables.

original: ming de skad ces bya ba gsungs pa'o //
analyzed: ming de skad ces bya ba gsungs pa'o //
translated: That is the name of the chapter.

original: ngo bo nyid med pa'i tshul gyis chos thams cad stong pa'o zhes bya ba la /üîΩchos kyang yin la thams cad kyang yin pas na /
analyzed: ngo bo nyid med pa'i tshul gyis chos thams cad stong pa'o zhes bya ba la / chos kyang yin la thams cad kyang yin pas na /
translated: All phenomena are empty by way of their lack of intrinsic reality.üîΩSince they are phenomena and also all,

original: chos thams cad de /
analyzed: chos thams cad de /
translated: they are all phenomena.

original: byang chub kyi sems dang / me long lta bu'i ye shes dang / kun gzhi'i rnam par shes pa dang / ngo bo nyid kyi sku dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i rigs kyi ngo bo nyid rnams te /
analyzed: byang chub kyi sems dang / me long lta bu'i ye shes dang / kun gzhi'i rnam par shes pa dang / ngo bo nyid kyi sku dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i rigs kyi ngo bo nyid rnams te /
translated: They are the thought of awakening, the mirror-like pristine awareness, the fundamental consciousness, the essential body, and the essence of the lineage of the transcendent lords.

original: de ni don dam par dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid yin pa'i phyir ston pa'o //
analyzed: de ni don dam par dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid yin pa'i phyir ston pa'o //
translated: They are taught as being empty because they are ultimately the nature of non-entityness.

original: don 'di nyid bstan par bya ba'i phyir ngo bo nyid med pa'i tshul gyis zhes bya ba gsungs te /
analyzed: don 'di nyid bstan par bya ba'i phyir ngo bo nyid med pa'i tshul gyis zhes bya ba gsungs te /
translated: In order to teach just this meaning, he says, by way of their lack of intrinsic reality.

original: rtag tu ngo bo nyid dang bral ba'i rang bzhin ni ngo bo nyid med pa'o //
analyzed: rtag tu ngo bo nyid dang bral ba'i rang bzhin ni ngo bo nyid med pa'o //
translated: The nature that is always devoid of intrinsic reality is lack of intrinsic reality.

original: de'i tshul gyis zhes bya ba ni de bzhin du ro gcig pa nyid de /
analyzed: de'i tshul gyis zhes bya ba ni de bzhin du ro gcig pa nyid de /
translated: By way of that is just like that, with a single taste.

original: ngo bo nyid med pa'i tshul des ji skad du bshad pa'i chos thams cad stong pa nyid yin gyi kun rdzob tu ni yod bzhin ba'o zhes ston pa yin no //
analyzed: ngo bo nyid med pa'i tshul des ji skad du bshad pa'i chos thams cad stong pa nyid yin gyi kun rdzob tu ni yod bzhin ba'o zhes ston pa yin no //
translated: By this method of non-substantiality, all things are emptiness, as has been explained. But they do exist conventionally.

original: mtshan ma med pa'i tshul gyis chos thams cad mtshan ma med pa'o zhes bya ba la /
analyzed: mtshan ma med pa'i tshul gyis chos thams cad mtshan ma med pa'o zhes bya ba la /
translated: By the method of signlessness, all things are signless.

original: sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang / mnyam pa nyid kyi ye shes dang / nyon mongs pa can gyi yid dang / rnam par smin pa'i sku dang / rin po che'i rigs ni chos thams cad do //
analyzed: sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang / mnyam pa nyid kyi ye shes dang / nyon mongs pa can gyi yid dang / rnam par smin pa'i sku dang / rin po che'i rigs ni chos thams cad do //
translated: The perfection of giving, the knowledge of equality, the afflicted mind, the body of maturation, and the precious class are all things.

original: de rnams kyi mtshan ma ni bdag la sogs par rnam par rtog pa'i bag chags te /
analyzed: de rnams kyi mtshan ma ni bdag la sogs par rnam par rtog pa'i bag chags te /
translated: Their signs are the habitual tendencies of the discrimination of self, etc.,

original: rnam par shes pa skyed par byed pa'i rgyu'o //
analyzed: rnam par shes pa skyed par byed pa'i rgyu'o //
translated: which are the causes of the production of consciousness.

original: mtshan mar mi 'dzin pas na mtshan ma med pa ste /
analyzed: mtshan mar mi 'dzin pas na mtshan ma med pa ste /
translated: Since one does not grasp signs, there is signlessness.

original: don dam par rnam par shes pa skyed par byed pa'i rgyu med do zhes bya ba'i don to //
analyzed: don dam par rnam par shes pa skyed par byed pa'i rgyu med do zhes bya ba'i don to //
translated: The meaning is that ultimately there is no cause for the production of consciousness.

original: don 'di nyid bstan par bya ba'i phyir mtshan ma med pa'i tshul gyis zhes bya ba gsungs te /
analyzed: don 'di nyid bstan par bya ba'i phyir mtshan ma med pa'i tshul gyis zhes bya ba gsungs te /
translated: In order to teach just this meaning, he says, ‚Äúby way of the signless.‚Äù

original: mtshan ma dang bral bas na mtshan ma med pa ste /
analyzed: mtshan ma dang bral bas na mtshan ma med pa ste /
translated: Free from signs is signless.

original: rnam par shes pa skyed par byed pa'i rgyu dang bral bas mtshan ma med pa'o //
analyzed: rnam par shes pa skyed par byed pa'i rgyu dang bral bas mtshan ma med pa'o //
translated: Free from the cause that generates consciousness is signless.

original: de nye bar bzung ba ni rgyur byas pa ste /
analyzed: de nye bar bzung ba ni rgyur byas pa ste /
translated: That is taken up, made the cause.

original: ji skad du bshad pa'i chos thams cad mtshan ma med pa rnams so //
analyzed: ji skad du bshad pa'i chos thams cad mtshan ma med pa rnams so //
translated: All phenomena explained in that way are signless.

original: smon pa med pa'i tshul gyis chos thams cad de /
analyzed: smon pa med pa'i tshul gyis chos thams cad de /
translated: By way of the wishless, all phenomena are wishless.

original: smon pa med pa'o zhes bya ba la shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / so sor rtog pa'i ye shes dang / @190a * //
analyzed: smon pa med pa'o zhes bya ba la shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / so sor rtog pa'i ye shes dang / @190a * //
translated: The perfection of wisdom, the wisdom of discernment,

original: rtog pa dang bcas pa dang / rtog pa med pa'i yid kyi rnam par shes pa dang / longs spyod rdzogs pa'i sku dang / padma'i rigs ni chos thams cad do //
analyzed: rtog pa dang bcas pa dang / rtog pa med pa'i yid kyi rnam par shes pa dang / longs spyod rdzogs pa'i sku dang / padma'i rigs ni chos thams cad do //
translated: the conceptual and non-conceptual mental consciousness, the enjoyment body, and the lotus family are all phenomena.

original: smon pa ni gsol ba 'debs pa ste /
analyzed: smon pa ni gsol ba 'debs pa ste /
translated: Wishing is supplicating.

original: 'dod pa'i dbang phyug tu 'gyur bar bgyi'o zhes bya ba la sogs pa dngos po la mngon par zhen pas smon pa'o //
analyzed: 'dod pa'i dbang phyug tu 'gyur bar bgyi'o zhes bya ba la sogs pa dngos po la mngon par zhen pas smon pa'o //
translated: Aspirations are the mental factor of aspiration, which is a form of craving that is attached to things.

original: smon pa med pa ni mtshan ma med pa'i phyir te /
analyzed: smon pa med pa ni mtshan ma med pa'i phyir te /
translated: Aspirations are absent in the perfection of wisdom because it is free of signs.

original: de ltar dngos po la mngon par mi zhen pa'o //üîΩde nyid bstan par bya ba'i phyir /
analyzed: de ltar dngos po la mngon par mi zhen pa'o // de nyid bstan par bya ba'i phyir /
translated: Thus, it is free of attachment to things.

original: smon pa med pa'i tshul gyis zhes bya ba gsungs te /üîΩsmon pa ni smon lam rnams te /
analyzed: smon pa med pa'i tshul gyis zhes bya ba gsungs te / smon pa ni smon lam rnams te /
translated: In order to demonstrate just that, it says, in the manner of the absence of aspirations.üîΩ Aspirations are the mental factor of aspiration, which is a form of craving that is attached to things.

original: dngos por 'dzin pa la mngon par zhen pas 'dod pa'i khams kyi dbang phyug la sogs par gsol ba 'debs pa'o //
analyzed: dngos por 'dzin pa la mngon par zhen pas 'dod pa'i khams kyi dbang phyug la sogs par gsol ba 'debs pa'o //
translated: It is called aspiration because it is the prayer for the lordship of the desire realm, and so on.

original: smon par mi byed pas na smon pa med pa ste /üîΩdngos por 'dzin pa med pas gsol ba mi 'debs pa'o //
analyzed: smon par mi byed pas na smon pa med pa ste / dngos por 'dzin pa med pas gsol ba mi 'debs pa'o //
translated: It is called the absence of aspirations because it is free of aspirations.

original: de'i tshul gyis zhes pa ni smon pa med pa nyid de /
analyzed: de'i tshul gyis zhes pa ni smon pa med pa nyid de /
translated: It is called the manner of the absence of aspirations because it is free of attachment to things.

original: des na chos de rnams smon pa med pa'o //
analyzed: des na chos de rnams smon pa med pa'o //
translated: Thus, those dharmas are called the absence of aspirations.

original: shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su dag pas chos thams cad rang bzhin gyis 'od gsal ba'o zhes bya ba la /
analyzed: shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su dag pas chos thams cad rang bzhin gyis 'od gsal ba'o zhes bya ba la /
translated: By the perfection of wisdom, all phenomena are naturally luminous.

original: brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / bya ba grub pa'i ye shes dang / mig dang / rna ba dang / sna dang / lce dang / lus kyi rnam par shes pa dang / sprul pa'i sku dang / las kyi rigs ni chos thams cad do //
analyzed: brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / bya ba grub pa'i ye shes dang / mig dang / rna ba dang / sna dang / lce dang / lus kyi rnam par shes pa dang / sprul pa'i sku dang / las kyi rigs ni chos thams cad do //
translated: The perfection of effort, the gnosis of successful activities, the eye, ear, nose, tongue, body consciousnesses, the emanation body, and the karma family are all phenomena.

original: de rnams ni rang bzhin zhes bya ba ngo bo nyid kyis mun pa dang bral ba ni rang bzhin gyis 'od gsal ba ste /
analyzed: de rnams ni rang bzhin zhes bya ba ngo bo nyid kyis mun pa dang bral ba ni rang bzhin gyis 'od gsal ba ste /
translated: They are said to be ‚Äúnatural,‚Äù that is, free of darkness by their very nature, and are therefore naturally luminous.

original: don dam par rnam par rtog pa thams cad dang bral ba'o //
analyzed: don dam par rnam par rtog pa thams cad dang bral ba'o //
translated: They are free of all conceptualization in the ultimate sense.

original: de ci'i phyir zhe na /
analyzed: de ci'i phyir zhe na /
translated: Why is this?

original: mi bden pa yongs su brtags pa rnams ni don dam par gdod ma nas ma skyes pa yin pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: mi bden pa yongs su brtags pa rnams ni don dam par gdod ma nas ma skyes pa yin pa'i phyir ro //
translated: Because, in the ultimate sense, all that is false and imagined is primordially unborn.

original: 'di nyid bstan par bya ba'i phyir shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su dag pa zhes bya ba gsungs te /
analyzed: 'di nyid bstan par bya ba'i phyir shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su dag pa zhes bya ba gsungs te /
translated: In order to teach just this, he says, ‚ÄúThe perfection of wisdom is pure.‚Äù

original: gzung ba dang 'dzin pa'i rnam par rtog pa bag chags dang bcas pa dang bral ba'i ye shes ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'o //
analyzed: gzung ba dang 'dzin pa'i rnam par rtog pa bag chags dang bcas pa dang bral ba'i ye shes ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'o //
translated: The wisdom that is free from the concepts of object and subject, along with their habitual tendencies, is the perfection of wisdom.

original: de'i rnam par dag pa ni de bzhin nyid de /
analyzed: de'i rnam par dag pa ni de bzhin nyid de /
translated: Its purity is suchness.

original: de bas na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su dag pa gang yin pa de nyid ni chos thams cad rnam par dag pa yin te /
analyzed: de bas na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su dag pa gang yin pa de nyid ni chos thams cad rnam par dag pa yin te /
translated: Therefore, the perfection of wisdom is pure, and all phenomena are pure.

original: gang gi phyir chos thams cad gang yin pa de ni /
analyzed: gang gi phyir chos thams cad gang yin pa de ni /
translated: Because all phenomena are

original: shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yin la /
analyzed: shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yin la /
translated: the perfection of wisdom.

original: shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa gang yin pa de ni chos @190b thams cad yin te /
analyzed: shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa gang yin pa de ni chos @190b thams cad yin te /
translated: And the perfection of wisdom is all phenomena.

original: de bas na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su dag pas chos thams cad rang bzhin gyis 'od gsal ba'o //
analyzed: de bas na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su dag pas chos thams cad rang bzhin gyis 'od gsal ba'o //
translated: Therefore, all phenomena are naturally luminous due to the purity of the perfection of wisdom.

original: tshig de dag gis ni rim pa bzhin du rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa dang / rang bzhin gyis 'od gsal ba rnams gsungs pa yin no //üîΩde ltar na de nas bcom ldan 'das zhes bya ba nas brtsams te /
analyzed: tshig de dag gis ni rim pa bzhin du rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa dang / rang bzhin gyis 'od gsal ba rnams gsungs pa yin no // de ltar na de nas bcom ldan 'das zhes bya ba nas brtsams te /
translated: These words declare the doors of liberation, namely, emptiness, signlessness, and wishlessness, and natural luminosity.

original: rang bzhin gyis 'od gsal ba'o zhes bya ba'i bar gyis bshad pas ni ting nge 'dzin dang po gsungs pa yin no //
analyzed: rang bzhin gyis 'od gsal ba'o zhes bya ba'i bar gyis bshad pas ni ting nge 'dzin dang po gsungs pa yin no //
translated: Thus, the first concentration is taught by the passage beginning with ‚Äúthen the Lord‚Äù and ending with ‚Äúnatural luminosity.‚Äù

original: da ni de nas zhes bya ba la sogs pas ting nge 'dzin gnyis pa gsungs pa yin te /

analyzed: de lta bu'i tshul gyis 'debs pa'i rnal 'byor pa ni myur du 'grub par 'gyur zhes bya ba ste /

original: shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la gnas pa myur pa nyid du thob par 'gyur zhes bya ba'i don to //
analyzed: shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la gnas pa myur pa nyid du thob par 'gyur zhes bya ba'i don to //

original: sangs rgyas bstan pa bsrung phyir dang // zhes bya ba la dngos po la mngon par zhen pa spangs pa na sangs rgyas kyi bstan pa ste /
analyzed: sangs rgyas bstan pa bsrung phyir dang // zhes bya ba la dngos po la mngon par zhen pa spangs pa na sangs rgyas kyi bstan pa ste /

original: sangs rgyas rnams kyi bka'o //
analyzed: sangs rgyas rnams kyi bka'o //

original: de bsrung ba ni dngos po med pa la mngon par zhen pa'i kun du spyod pa ste /
analyzed: de bsrung ba ni dngos po med pa la mngon par zhen pa'i kun du spyod pa ste /

analyzed: de'i phyir dang sems can mang po bsrung ba'i phyir zhes bya ba ni /
translated: Therefore, and in order to protect many beings,

original: rgyu de'i phyir dang / ji skad du bshad pa'i ral gri dang / nam mkhar sangs rgyas sbyor ba 'di yis bsad na rnal 'byor pas bsod nams thob par 'gyur ro //
analyzed: rgyu de'i phyir dang / ji skad du bshad pa'i ral gri dang / nam mkhar sangs rgyas sbyor ba 'di yis bsad na rnal 'byor pas bsod nams thob par 'gyur ro //

analyzed: ci'i phyir zhe na / 'dis bsad sdig par mi 'gyur zhing //

analyzed: ji ltar chos kyis slob dpon gyi rang nyid 'jug pa la sogs pa'i cho ga gsungs pa de bzhin du slob ma rnams la yang bya'o // de ltar slob dpon 'jug pa la sogs pa'i cho ga bzhin du slob ma zhugs pa la sogs pa'i cho ga byas pa'i slob ma rnams ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su dag pa rnam pa bzhis stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang /
translated: Just as the Dharma Master has taught the ritual of his own entry, etc., so also should it be done for the disciples.

analyzed: smon pa med pa dang / rang bzhin gyis 'od gsal ba'i rnam par thar pa'i sgo rnams pa bzhi'i ngo bo nyid kyis /

analyzed: myur du bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'gyur ro zhes bya ba ste /

analyzed: slob ma'i phan yon gsungs pa yin no //

analyzed: de bzhin gshegs pa ni 'dod pa thams cad kyi snod yin te /
